i1.name: Stone Skin
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Wukong''' gains {{as|{{pp|5 to 9}} {{sti|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and [[Health regeneration|regenerates]] {{sti|health regeneration|{{as|{{fd|0.5}}% of his '''maximum''' health}}}} per 5 seconds.

''Stone Skin's'' effects are increased by 50% for 5 seconds whenever '''Wukong''' or his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} damages an enemy {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|monster}}, [[stack]]ing up to 10 times for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|5*(1+0.5*10) to 9*(1+0.5*10)}} '''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|3% '''maximum''' health}} regeneration.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Wukong gains 5 − 9 (based on level) bonus armor and Health regeneration 0.5% of his maximum health per 5 seconds.
Stone Skin's effects are increased by 50% for 5 seconds whenever Wukong or his Wukong's clone damages an enemy champion or monster, stacking up to 10 times for a maximum of 5*(1+0.5*10) − 9*(1+0.5*10) (based on level) bonus armor and 3% maximum health regeneration.

q1.name: Crushing Blow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' and his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} empower their staffs, causing their next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds to have an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reduce the target's armor}}}} for 3 seconds.
''Crushing Blow's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{fd|0.5}} seconds whenever '''Wukong''' or his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} damages an enemy.
''Crushing Blow'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Wukong's''' and his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone's}} basic attack timer.
''Other abilities can be used during the attack's animation.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Wukong and his Wukong's clone empower their staffs, causing their next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain bonus range, deal bonus physical damage and reduce the target's armor for 3 seconds.
Crushing Blow's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Wukong or his Wukong's clone damages an enemy.
Crushing Blow resets Wukong's and his Wukong's clone's basic attack timer.
Other abilities can be used during the attack's animation.
q1.notes:
* ''Crushing Blow'' triggers on {{tip|turret|structures}} and {{tip|ward|wards}} but the armor reduction is not applied.
* Pressing ''S'' will cancel the animation and the attack will still land, but '''Wukong''' will not be able to move until it lands.

effects.str:
• Bonus Range:
  • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 45% bonus AD)
  • Armor Reduction: % of target's armor

w1.name: Warrior Trickster
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location while entering {{tip|invisibility}} for 1 second and leaving behind a {{tip|clone|decoy}} of himself at his casting position for {{fd|3.25}} seconds.

The clone is {{tip|untargetable}} to allies and can [[basic attack]] autonomously, prioritizing the last enemy '''Wukong''' damaged. It can also gain the effects of {{ai|Crushing Blow|Wukong}}, {{ais|Nimbus Strike|Wukong}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, and {{ai|Cyclone|Wukong}} whenever '''Wukong''' does.
The clone deals reduced outgoing damage.
'''Wukong''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Warrior Trickster's'' dash.
''See [[Wukong/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for more details about '''Wukong's''' clone. Warrior Trickster will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Wukong dashes to the target location while entering invisibility for 1 second and leaving behind a decoy of himself at his casting position for 3.25 seconds.
The clone is untargetable to allies and can basic attack autonomously, prioritizing the last enemy Wukong damaged. It can also gain the effects of Wukong's Crushing Blow, Wukong's Nimbus Strike bonus attack speed, and Wukong's Cyclone whenever Wukong does.
The clone deals reduced outgoing damage.
Wukong can cast any of his champion ability during Warrior Trickster's dash.
See Wukong/LoL#Pets for more details about Wukong's clone. Warrior Trickster will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
w1.notes:
* Casting ''Warrior Trickster'' during an ability's effects will transfer them to the clone.
* {{tip|Turret}} shots instantly kill the clone.
* The clone is immune to {{tip|stasis}} and {{ui|Blast Cone}}.
* The clone can still be targeted by allied {{tip|auto-targeted}} effects (e.g. {{si|Heal}}, {{ai|Celestial Blessing|Kayle}}).

e1.name: Nimbus Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' {{tip|dashes}} on a cloud to the target enemy's location and sends out {{tip|untargetable}} ''clones'' to attack up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to each enemy struck upon arrival. ''Nimbus Strike'' deals 160% damage to {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
Upon hitting the target, '''Wukong''' and his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
'''Wukong''' cannot cast {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}} nor {{ai|Cyclone|Wukong}} while dashing, but he may still buffer them. {{ai|Crushing Blow|Wukong}} can be used.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Wukong dashes on a cloud to the target enemy's location and sends out untargetable clones to attack up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage to each enemy struck upon arrival. Nimbus Strike deals 160% damage to monsters.
Upon hitting the target, Wukong and his Wukong's clone gain bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Wukong cannot cast Wukong's Warrior Trickster nor Wukong's Cyclone while dashing, but he may still buffer them. Wukong's Crushing Blow can be used.
e1.notes:
* The ''clones'' can block non-targeted attacks or abilities for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after hitting their targets.
* ''Nimbus Strike'' has an offset distance of 75 units from the target dashed to.
* The ability applies a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} / {{ri|Phase Rush}} even if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The created ''clones'' are considered champions for {{ii|Turret Plating|Turret Plating's}} {{g|gold}} sharing.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
  • Monster Damage: (+ % AP)

r1.name: Cyclone
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Wukong''' and his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} spin their staffs around for up to 2 seconds, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}}, and dealing {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to nearby enemies. Enemies affected by an active ''Cyclone'' for the first time are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.6}} seconds. ''Cyclone'' can be canceled by casting another [[champion ability|ability]] or recasting after {{fd|0.5}} seconds. ''Cyclone'' can be recast within 8 seconds of the first cast after 1 second.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Wukong''' and his {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong|clone}} spin their staffs a second time, mimicking the first cast's effects. If recast while spinning, '''Wukong''' stops spinning early instead; '''Wukong''' can still spin a second time after stopping his first spin early, and can end his second spin early as well.
The clone's ''Cyclone'' will not {{tip|airborne|knock up}} enemies who were already hit by '''Wukong's''' active ''Cyclone''.
{{ais|Nimbus Strike|Wukong}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} duration is continuously refreshed while spinning.
''Cyclone's'' damage is capped at {{pp|200 to 600 for 3|6;11;16}} per second against {{tip|monsters}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Wukong and his Wukong's clone spin their staffs around for up to 2 seconds, becoming ghosted, gaining 20% bonus movement speed, and dealing physical damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies. Enemies affected by an active Cyclone for the first time are knocked up for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone can be canceled by casting another champion ability or recasting after 0.5 seconds. Cyclone can be recast within 8 seconds of the first cast after 1 second.
Recast: Wukong and his Wukong's clone spin their staffs a second time, mimicking the first cast's effects. If recast while spinning, Wukong stops spinning early instead; Wukong can still spin a second time after stopping his first spin early, and can end his second spin early as well.
The clone's Cyclone will not knock up enemies who were already hit by Wukong's active Cyclone.
Wukong's Nimbus Strike bonus attack speed duration is continuously refreshed while spinning.
Cyclone's damage is capped at 6;11;16 ‒ undefined per second against monsters.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Tick|{{as|{{ap|4/4 to 8/4}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110/4}}% AD)}}|Total Damage|{{as|{{ap|4*4 to 8*4}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110*4}}% AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Cyclone'' is special cased to grant stacks of {{ri|Conqueror}} for each tick of damage.
* Casting {{ai|Crushing Blow|Wukong}} will cancel ''Cyclone'' for both '''Wukong''' and his clone. {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}} and {{ai|Nimbus Strike|Wukong}} will only interrupt '''Wukong's''' ''Cyclone''.
* ''Cyclone's'' remaining duration always stays the same even after the clone replicated the ability.
* During ''Cyclone'', '''Wukong''' and his clone's {{sti|attack ranges|link=range}} are reduced {{ft|to 50|by 125}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block one instance of damage.
** Blocking the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} will still grant immunity to it from either of ''Cyclone's'' casts.
{{ct|attack=false|move=true|cast=Other abilities are disabled for the first {{fd|0.3}} seconds, casting them afterwards interrupts.|items=true|consume=true|spells=true,true,true,false,true|interrupts=death}}
